General.Name: Henan Provincial Communications Planning & Design Institute Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Henan Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides engineering consulting services in China and internationally. It provides consulting, planning, surveying, designing, mapping, testing, monitoring, general contracting, engineering management, and other engineering consulting services. The company was formerly known as Henan Provincial Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Henan Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd in December 2021. Henan Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd was founded in 1964 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.
